document.full_text: a. j. burnett, trying to rebound from a lackluster season, went five effective innings and mark teixeira, normally a slow starter, hit his second homer of the season.
document.title: yankees 10, tigers 6: burnett and teixeira show their strengths early
lines_and_colors: a. j. burnett, trying to rebound from a lackluster season, went five effective innings and mark teixeira, normally a slow starter, hit his second homer of the season.
